thread.title: Experience the wild with thrilling discounts!Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Experience the wild with thrilling discounts!Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Experience the wild with thrilling discounts!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Experience the wild with thrilling discounts! Published on : Tuesday, August 25, 2015
With the holiday season just around the corner, it’s time to go unconventional and set free to the wild. All adventure enthusiasts may gear up to embrace just the perfect package crafted especially for you. Taj Safaris is set to reopen their lodges with attractive offers which allow you 20% discount for all stays in September.
Tucked away in the outskirts of the national parks of Madhya Pradesh, experience an opulent twist to adventure at Taj Safaris’ exquisite lodges – Pashan Garh and Baghvan commencing September 1 st , 2015 .
Let the adventure galore continue by experiencing the luxurious Mahua Kothi and Banjaar Tola safari lodges opening on October 1 st ,2015 .
So pack your bags, unleash the adventure junkie and book your stay to avail these intriguing offers!
PLAN PER PERSON PER NIGHT RATES STARTING FROM Bed & Breakfast Plan (Room accommodation and breakfast) INR 6,500 Limited Jungle Plan (Room accommodation, taxes, all meals, soft beverages, park fees, 01 safari game drive each day, laundry) INR 13,000 Full Jungle Plan (Room accommodation, taxes, all meals, house wines & liquor, soft beverages, park fees, 02 safari game drive each day, laundry, one special experience per day (special turn down/ meal experience/sun downer etc) INR 16,500
